segments.text: Alice , it really was great . I think it was the most interesting thing here . You really should go in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really . The special effects are fantastic.You shouldn't be scared . You would really enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sam , I never like Haunted Houses.When I was a kid , I didn't like them . when I was in high school , I didn't like them.when I was in college , I didn't like them . So why should I like them now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But this is maybe one of the best Haunted Houses in North America ! It's different .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't we go to the Epcot Center instead ? They have displays from many cultures around the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I saw that in the guide.It looks like they have different restaurants and different kinds of architecture.Do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . That is something I will enjoy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , let's go then . How many tickets do we have left ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We still have most of the tickets we bought.We can go on a lot of different rides if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was only interested in the Haunted House and the roller coaster rides.The other rides are for kids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's start walking to the Epcot Center then.According to this map , it is up this pathway here .
segments.speaker: S2
